game.name: sYs - Save Your Soul
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 추적되는 컨트롤러 지원, VR 전용, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: As a prototype AI trying to escape a secret facility, you explore abandoned complexes, gather ingredients, craft weapons, tools, and machines, and face malfunctioning robots with no guidance to find the exit.
game.shortDescriptionEn: As a prototype AI trying to escape a secret facility, you explore abandoned complexes, gather ingredients, craft weapons, tools, and machines, and face malfunctioning robots with no guidance to find the exit.
